name: Bujin Torifune
effectText: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 2 "Bujin" monsters of 2 different Types from the Deck in Defense Position, except "Bujin Torifune". When you Xyz Summon a "Bujin" Xyz Monster, while this card is in your GY: You can equip this card to it. Any monster destroyed by battle with that equipped monster is banished. You can only use each effect of "Bujin Torifune" once per turn.
